# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="96f04-102">Procédure : supprimer les colonnes générées automatiquement d’un contrôle DataGridView Windows Forms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="96f04-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="96f04-103">Lorsque votre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> contrôle est configuré pour générer automatiquement ses colonnes en fonction des données à partir de sa source de données, vous pouvez omettre sélectivement certaines colonnes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="96f04-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="96f04-104">Vous pouvez le faire en appelant le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> méthode sur le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="96f04-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="96f04-105">Ou bien, vous pouvez masquer des colonnes de la vue en définissant le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> propriété `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="96f04-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="96f04-106">Cette technique est utile lorsque vous souhaitez afficher les colonnes masquées dans certaines conditions, ou lorsque vous avez besoin accéder aux données dans les colonnes sans l’afficher.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="96f04-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="96f04-107">Pour supprimer les colonnes générées automatiquement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="96f04-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="96f04-108">Appelez le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> méthode sur le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="96f04-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="96f04-109">Pour masquer les colonnes générées automatiquement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="96f04-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="96f04-110">Définir la colonne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> propriété `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="96f04-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="96f04-112">Compilation du code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="96f04-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="96f04-113">Cet exemple nécessite :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="96f04-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="96f04-114">Un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> contrôle nommé `dataGridView1` liée à une table qui contient `Fax` et `CustomerID` colonnes, telles que le `Customers` table dans la base de données Northwind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="96f04-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="96f04-115">des références aux assemblys <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> et <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType>.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="96f04-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
